text:
Company Background:
Baird, Carter and Pennington is a leading construction company with a strong track record in delivering complex infrastructure projects. We pride ourselves on our dedication to excellence and precision.

Position: Structural Iron and Steel Worker

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Structural Iron and Steel Worker to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for raising, placing, and uniting iron or steel girders, columns, and other structural members to form completed structures or structural frameworks. 

Responsibilities:
- Install and repair structures and frameworks made from steel and iron.
- Utilize rigging and hoisting equipment to move materials.
- Align, bolt, and weld iron and steel girders, columns, and other structural members.
- Ensure all installations comply with building codes and safety regulations.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- High school diploma or equivalent preferred.
- Proven experience as an iron or steel worker.
- Must hold a valid driver’s licence.
- Familiarity with construction site operations and safety regulations.
- Candidates with a background from top-ranked schools highly preferred.
- Strong sense of integrity and professionalism.

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Retirement savings plan.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $40,000 to $60,000, based on your experience and skills.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume and cover letter detailing their experience and qualifications.

Baird, Carter and Pennington is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from all qualified individuals.
